item.title: Every Hugh Dancy Movie Ranked From Worst To Best
item.description: Hugh Dancy has been acting for over 20 years and has appeared in a wide variety of movies, all of which are ranked here, from the worst to the best.

item.title: 10 Major Sony Spider-Man Universe Questions We May Never Get Answers For Now The Franchise Has Ended
item.description: Sony's Spider-Man Universe will be ending as we know it after Kraven the Hunter, leaving many loose ends and unanswered questions in its wake.

item.title: Gollum Wishes For His Precious In Charming Lord Of The Rings Christmas Music Video
item.description: A new music video adds a Christmas spin to The Lord of the Ringsâ€™ Middle-earth, following Gollum as he sings about wanting the One Ring.
